programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Anjali gives Taarak the idea to write an article on the water problem in the country. While playing, the kids waste a lot of water and Bhide gets angry with them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide informs the ladies about the possible water shortage in the city. While taking bath, the water goes off and Jethalal is forced to use cold water from the refrigerator.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: After everyone suffers due to wastage of water, the members of Gokuldham Society decide upon a fine system.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Mishaps and adventures follow as everyone tries to fill their buckets from the tanker. While Jethalal gets his foot stuck in a pot, Champaklal accidentally gets drenched to the bones.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal's attempts to impress Babita with her water bucket are thwarted due to Popatlal. Later, the residents go through various troubles due to water shortage.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Talking to Jethalal, Taarak gets very emotional about the food Anjali makes him eat daily. Carrying the tiffin he was trying to avoid, he comes up with a plan to deal with it.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Anjali is furious that Taarak has been giving away her home-cooked meals to strangers. She calls a meeting with all the men of Gokuldham to make a decision.

programme.title: CID

programme.title: CID

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bagha blames himself for the ongoing conflict between Jethalal and Champaklal. Later, he decides to apologise to Jethalal for his mistake.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Taarak tells Jethalal to go on a hunger strike until Champaklal feeds him with his own hands. This helps them bury their feud and reunite.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah

programme.desc: A visibly furious Tatya refuses to follow Gajanan's diktat when he is alone with him. Later, Gajanan complains to Sai about this, and Tatya gets asked to leave Dwarka Mai.

programme.title: Mere Sai - Shraddha Aur Saburi
programme.desc: Sai miraculously saves a person from getting robbed by bandits. On the other hand, the residents of Shirdi wish to speak to Sai about Gajanan's growing clout.

programme.title: Mere Sai - Shraddha Aur Saburi
programme.desc: After being abandoned by the villagers owing to his ailment, Amir finds himself outside a shelter home on the outskirts of Shirdi.

programme.title: Mere Sai - Shraddha Aur Saburi
